title: Seperate payment for chargeback is impossible from paypal (need help).
body: I have a chargeback of 480 $ CAD who is 347 in USD and bought 3 prepaid card of 200 $ each but the amount doesnt subtract from the total amount from paypal . So i dont know wht to do ? Can riot do multiple transaction splitted so i can unlock my account because if no i bought 600 $ of prepaid card for nothing . Plz help . Also i sent a support ticket at 2 AM but how much time it take so i get a respond ?

Thanks!  I was able to confirm that your ticket was received, and escalated to our billing team.  A specialist will review your case and reply back as soon as they can!  In the meantime, I did some research and it looks like partial/separate payments are not available.  We also don't have $200 RP cards so I am assuming you mean a debit/gift card.  In this case, your best bet would to add the funds to your paypal account and use that to repay the negative balance.  Otherwise, hang tight and your specialist will reach out!

Regarding your other post, I'm not sure where you're seeing the CAD but if it's still an issue just let your specialist know!
